pages.about: FitBuilder journey to a healthier, stronger, and happier you! FitBuilder +919876544215 FitBuilder@gmail.com Learn More Home-page About Us Services Trainers About Us Is a state-of-the-art gym that strives to help every person achieve their fitness goals and improve their overall health. Our mission is to create a supportive and motivating environment where everyone finds their own path to a healthy lifestyle. Start Our Story Welcome to FitBuilder - your ultimate destination for fitness enthusiasts! At FitBuilder, we're passionate about helping individuals sculpt their bodies while nurturing their love for coffee. Our journey began with a vision to create a space where fitness meets relaxation, where members can enjoy their favorite workout routines while sipping on premium coffee blends. We are dedicated to providing top-notch fitness facilities and expert guidance to our members, ensuring they achieve their fitness goals effectively and enjoyably. With a focus on personalized training programs and a commitment to excellence, FitBuilder has become the go-to place for fitness enthusiasts who appreciate the perfect blend of exercise. Contact Us Daily pass: This type of membership is suitable for those who prefer to visit the gym only occasionally or want to try our services before purchasing. Get Weekly subscription: Offers access to the gym for an entire week, providing longer training time and savings compared to purchasing daily passes. Get Monthly membership: Ideal for those who plan regular training and want access to the gym throughout the month. Get Quarterly Membership: Provides longer training opportunities and Zyzz significant savings over a monthly membership. Get Experience the ultimate commitment. Dive into our dynamic group fitness classes, led by experienced instructors who will motivate and challenge you to reach new heights. With our Quarterly Membership, you'll enjoy the flexibility to pursue your fitness goals with dedication and determination. Join us today and embark on a transformative fitness journey that lasts a quarter and beyond. Contact Never Give Up For Training Gym Choose Your Plan: 1-Month Plan Unlimited access to the gym facilities Unrestricted entry to the club's Aqua zone Participation in over 30 diverse group fitness classes 2 complimentary starter workouts Purchase 3-Month Plan Full access to gym amenities Unlimited visits to the club's Aqua zone Enjoy a variety of more than group fitness sessions 2 complimentary introductory sessions 3-Month membership freeze option Fitness assessment with consultation from our expert Purchase 6-Month Plan Unlimited access to our state-of-the-art gym facilities Continuous entry to the club's Aqua zone Access to an extensive range of over 30 group fitness classes 2 complimentary introductory workouts Option to freeze membership for up to 6-Month 2 guest passes included Purchase Find out more Contact Us Maps Gayatri Nagar, Daganiya, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492013, India Phone +919876544215 Email FitBuilder@gmail.com Home-Page About us Services Trainers Privacy Policy Terms of Use FitBuilder © 2024 All Rights Reserved.
pages.index: Welcome to FitBuilder! FitBuilder +919876544215 FitBuilder@gmail.com Get Started Home-Page About Us Services Trainers Shape Your Body and Mind. Right Here with Us. Get Started Transform Your Body and Elevate Your Mindset. Experience the Ultimate Fusion of Fitness and Mental Well-being with Us. Welcome to FitBuilder! At FitBuilder, we are dedicated to providing a premium fitness experience for individuals of all levels. Our state-of-the-art facilities and expert trainers are here to help you reach your fitness goals and lead a healthier lifestyle. Our classes offer a diverse range of workouts, from strength training and cardio to yoga and Pilates, ensuring that there is something for everyone. Whether you're new to fitness or a seasoned athlete, our supportive community and personalized approach will keep you motivated and on track. Learn More Fitness Category Training Strength Training Build muscle and increase endurance with our strength training classes, suitable for all fitness levels. Cardio Get your heart pumping and burn calories with our high-energy cardio workouts, designed to health. Yoga Find balance and flexibility with our yoga classes, featuring a variety of styles for practitioners of all levels. Pilates Strengthen your core and improve posture with our Pilates classes, focusing on controlled movements and breath work. HIIT Experience high-intensity interval training with our HIIT classes, proven to boost metabolism and burn fat effectively. Boxing Release stress and build strength with our boxing classes, combining cardio and strength exercises in a fun and challenging workout. Fitness Training Progress Track your fitness progress with us! Our Fitness Training Progress program gives you all the tools you need to achieve your goals. We'll help you develop a personalized training plan, track your progress and continually improve your fitness levels. Together we will achieve incredible results and turn your dreams into reality! Contact Zumba Dance your way to fitness with our Zumba classes, featuring energetic music and easy-to-follow choreography for a full-body workout. Explore Category Personal Training Receive personalized guidance and support from our certified trainers with one-on-one personal training sessions tailored to your individual goals and needs. Flexible Schedule Choose from a variety of class times and formats to fit your busy schedule and make fitness a priority. Customized Workouts Benefit from customized workout plans designed to target your specific goals and maximize results. Free Trial Session Sign up for a free trial session to experience our training firsthand and see what FitBuilder can do for you. Choose Your Plans Choose your plan with us! Whatever your goals and preferences, we offer a variety of plans and programs that are perfect for you. Whether it's fitness, healthy eating, meditation or anything else, we have a plan to help you achieve the results you want. Choose your plan now and start on the path to the best version of yourself! See Plans Contact's I accept - Privacy Policy Send FitBuilder About us Services Trainers Privacy Policy Terms of Use © 2024 All Rights Reserved.
pages.policy: FitBuilder Privacy Policy FitBuilder +919876544215 FitBuilder@gmail.com See More Home-page About us Services trainers Privacy Policy At FitBuilder, we prioritize safeguarding your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy delineates our approach to collecting, utilizing, disclosing, and safeguarding your data when you engage with our services. We may gather personal information from you when you interact with our website, enroll for lessons, or communicate with us via email or phone. This information may encompass your name, email address, phone number, postal address, payment details, and any other information voluntarily provided by you. The information we collect serves various purposes, including: - Providing and enhancing our services - Corresponding with you regarding your lessons, events, and promotions - Processing payments and invoices - Addressing your inquiries and requests - Sending you important updates and notifications - Adhering to legal and regulatory obligations We may share your personal information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, managing our business, or serving you. These third parties are granted access to your personal information solely for performing designated tasks on our behalf and are bound by confidentiality agreements. Your information may also be disclosed in the following circumstances: - To fulfill legal obligations or enforce our policies - To safeguard the rights, property, or safety of FitBuilder, our clientele, or others - In connection with a merger, acquisition, or asset sale You retain the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise these rights or have inquiries about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at FitBuilder@gmail.com. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify our Privacy Policy periodically. Any alterations will be published on this page, with the revised date indicated at the top of the policy. Contact Us Should you have any queries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy or our handling of your personal information, please reach out to us at FitBuilder@gmail.com. Conclusion By utilizing our services, you consent to the collection and utilization of your personal information as delineated in this Privacy Policy. We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring the security of your data. We will retain your personal information for the duration necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless extended retention is mandated or permitted by law. Upon cessation of necessity, we will securely erase or anonymize your information. Your personal information may be transmitted to and stored on servers situated outside of your jurisdiction or country. By availing our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to these servers. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and suspect that your child has furnished us with personal information, kindly notify us promptly. Third-Party Links Our website may feature links to third-party websites or services not owned or controlled by FitBuilder. We do not assume responsibility for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit. Consent By utilizing our services, you agree to the collection, utilization, and disclosure of your personal information as outlined in this Privacy Policy. Updates to This Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. We will notify you of any changes by publishing the updated Privacy Policy on this page. It is advisable to periodically review this Privacy Policy for any revisions. Contact Us Should you have any queries or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy or our handling of your personal information, please contact us at FitBuilder@gmail.com. Depending on your jurisdiction and applicable laws, you may possess certain rights concerning your personal information. These rights may encompass: - Right to Access: The right to request access to the personal information we hold about you and receive a copy of said information. - Right to Rectification: The right to request correction of any inaccuracies in your personal information. - Right to Erasure: The right to request deletion of your personal information under specific circumstances, such as when it is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected. - Right to Restrict Processing: The right to request restriction of the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances, such as when you contest the accuracy of the data. - Right to Data Portability: The right to request a copy of your personal information in a structured, machine-readable format and transmit that data to another controller. - Right to Object: The right to object to the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances, such as when we process your data for direct marketing purposes. How to Exercise Your Rights Should you wish to exercise any of the aforementioned rights or have inquiries or concerns about our handling of your personal information, please contact us at FitBuilder@gmail.com. We will address your request in accordance with applicable laws. Complaints If you believe that we have not adhered to this Privacy Policy or applicable data protection laws, you possess the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority in your jurisdiction. We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website. Conclusion Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal information. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or our practices regarding your personal information, please contact us at FitBuilder@gmail.com Home-page About us Services Trainers Privacy Policy Terms of Use FitBuilder © 2024 All Rights Reserved.
pages.services: FitBuilder - group fitness classes FitBuilder +919876544215 FitBuilder@gmail.com Get Started Home-Page About Us Services Trainers Services Explore a world of fitness possibilities at FitBuilder, where every service is tailored to elevate your workout experience. From cutting-edge equipment and personalized training sessions to dynamic group classes and rejuvenating amenities, we offer everything you need to sculpt your dream physique and achieve your fitness goals. Join us today and embark on a transformative journey to a healthier, stronger you. Start Our Services At FitBuilder, we offer more than just a gym - we provide a comprehensive fitness experience tailored to meet your needs. From state-of-the-art equipment to personalized training programs, we're here to help you achieve your fitness goals and lead a healthier lifestyle. State-of-the-Art Facilities Our gym features top-of-the-line equipment and facilities designed to optimize your workout experience. Whether you're into strength training, cardio, or functional fitness, we have everything you need to push your limits and get results. Expert Personal Training Our certified personal trainers are dedicated to helping you reach your full potential. They'll work with you one-on-one to develop a customized workout plan tailored to your goals, fitness level, and schedule, ensuring you get the most out of every session. Group Fitness Classes From high-energy cardio sessions to calming yoga classes, our group fitness programs offer something for everyone. Led by experienced instructors, these classes provide motivation, accountability, and a sense of community to keep you on track and having fun. Alexandr Zyzz FitBuilder has become my second home! The variety of equipment and classes keeps my workouts exciting and effective. Plus, the supportive community here is unbeatable! Michael B. I've been a member of FitBuilder for years now, and I couldn't be happier with my experience. The staff is always friendly and helpful, and the facilities are top-notch. It's truly a fantastic place to work on your fitness goals. David M. As someone who's new to fitness, FitBuilder has been incredibly welcoming. The staff took the time to show me around and help me feel comfortable, and I've already noticed improvements in my strength and stamina. I'm excited to see where my fitness journey takes me here! pages.teatcher: At FitBuilder, our trainers are the heart and soul of our fitness community. FitBuilder +919876544215 FitBuilder@gmail.com See More Home-page About us Services Trainers Trainers At FitBuilder, we have experienced trainers ready to help you achieve your fitness goals. Our trainers have a high professional level and extensive experience working with clients of different skill levels. They offer individual training programs, group classes and personalized nutrition, and also share the secrets of a healthy lifestyle. Trainers' Achievements Trainer of the Year Award Coach Zyzz Aziz Sergeevich was honored with the prestigious Trainer of the Year award for her exceptional contributions to the fitness industry and remarkable results in coaching clients towards their fitness objectives. Champion at Fitness Challenge Instructor Michael Smith and his trainees secured victory at a regional fitness challenge, showcasing their dedication and prowess in functional fitness. Nutrition Excellence Award Nutritionist Emily Davis received the Nutrition Excellence Award for her outstanding commitment to promoting healthy eating habits and fostering nutritional awareness among clients. See more Our Trainers Meet our dedicated team of trainers, each of whom specializes in various aspects of fitness and wellness. Our trainers possess not only advanced knowledge in exercise science but also extensive experience in guiding individuals towards their fitness objectives. They offer personalized training sessions, group classes, and nutritional advice tailored to individual needs. Our team comprises experts in strength training, cardiovascular fitness, flexibility, and nutrition. We take pride in our trainers, who are committed to inspiring and empowering our clients to achieve their fitness goals and lead healthier lives. Strength & Conditioning Coach Personal Trainer CrossFit Instructor Yoga Instructor Nutritionist Founder, Head Trainer Insight into Our Trainers Insight into Our Trainers provides a comprehensive overview of the professional backgrounds and expertise of our trainers. This feature highlights the unique qualifications, achievements, and passion for fitness of each trainer. Learn about their specialized areas, training methodologies, and success stories of clients they have coached. This resource will help you make an informed decision in selecting the right trainer to embark on your fitness journey. Start Now Fitness Programs At FitBuilder, we offer a diverse range of fitness programs designed to cater to different goals and fitness levels. Whether you prefer one-on-one coaching or group sessions, we have something for everyone. Hover Card Weight Loss This program is designed to help individuals achieve their weight loss goals through personalized exercise routines and nutritional guidance. Muscle Building For those aiming to increase muscle mass and strength, our muscle-building program focuses on progressive resistance training and optimal nutrition. Flexibility Enhance your flexibility and mobility with our flexibility program, which incorporates dynamic stretching, yoga, and corrective exercises. Personal Training Experience personalized attention and tailored workouts with our personal training sessions, designed to address your specific fitness needs and goals. At FitBuilder, we are proud of our trainers. They are dedicated professionals who are always ready to help you achieve your fitness and health goals. Not only do our trainers have extensive training experience, but they inspire, motivate and empower our clients at every stage of their fitness journey. They outline training programs beyond your employee's skill level and goals. With them, you can be sure that you will get not only results, but also pleasure from the training process. pages.thanks: Submit your inquiry form on the FitBuilder website. Thank You We sincerely appreciate your interest in FitBuilder and for taking the time to submit your inquiry through our website. Your decision to reach out to us signifies your commitment to prioritizing your health and fitness goals, and we are thrilled to be a part of your journey. At FitBuilder, we understand that embarking on a fitness journey can be both exciting and challenging. That's why we're here to support you every step of the way. Your decision to engage with us not only demonstrates your dedication to personal growth but also allows us the opportunity to provide you with the guidance, resources, and support you need to succeed. By submitting your inquiry, you've taken the first step towards a healthier and happier lifestyle, and we commend you for that. Whether you're looking to build muscle, lose weight, improve your endurance, or simply enhance your overall well-being, our team of dedicated professionals is here to help you achieve your goals. Rest assured that your inquiry is important to us, and our team is diligently working to review and respond to it as quickly as possible. We strive to provide each of our clients with personalized attention and tailored solutions to meet their specific needs and preferences. In the meantime, we encourage you to explore our website further to learn more about the range of services and programs we offer. From personalized training plans and nutritional guidance to group fitness classes and wellness workshops, we have everything you need to kickstart your journey to a healthier you. Once again, thank you for choosing FitBuilder as your partner in health and fitness. We look forward to the opportunity to support you in achieving your goals and helping you live your best life. If you have any further questions or concerns in the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. Your satisfaction and success are our top priorities, and we're here to assist you in any way we can. Thank you again for choosing FitBuilder. Here's to your health, happiness, and success! Go back
